name: Irony Curtain: From Matryoshka with Love - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The official soundtrack for Irony Curtain: From Matryoshka with Love by Arkadiusz Reikowski, known also as the composer for Layers of Fear, Seven: Days Long Gone, Kholat, and >observer_. The soundtrack includes the piece Irony Curtain, written by Peter McConnell, composer of soundtracks for Monkey Island, Sam & Max, Full Throttle, Grim Fandango & Broken Age.

Soundtrack is available in both .mp3 and FLAC audio formats and will be downloaded to the game's installation directory: ...\Steam\SteamApps\common\Irony Curtain\Soundtrack\

Tracklist:

  • 01. Peter McConnell - Irony Curtain
  • 02. Arkadiusz Reikowski - Clues
  • 03. Arkadiusz Reikowski - The Hotel (feat. Grzegorz Krawczyk)
  • 04. Arkadiusz Reikowski - Agents (feat. Grzegorz Krawczyk)
  • 05. Arkadiusz Reikowski - The Crimson Square (feat. Grzegorz Krawczyk)
  • 06. Arkadiusz Reikowski - GORKPark
  • 07. Arkadiusz Reikowski - Soldier's Song
  • 08. Arkadiusz Reikowski - Subway
  • 09. Arkadiusz Reikowski - The Palace
  • 10. Arkadiusz Reikowski - Vlad
  • 11. Arkadiusz Reikowski - The Leader
